page.title: 05Marldon Clubs, Adults
page.content: {The Gardening Club}has 75 members. It meets in the Village hall & has speakers. Members get discounts on materials & go on visits. Each year there is a show in the Meadow of flowers, vegetables, cakes and jams, flower arranging, and heavy horses. {Womens' Institute.}There are 2 in Marldon, one in the afternoon and one in the evening, once a month.They have isiting speakers and competitions and between them they have about 70 members. {The Over 50's Club}meets weekly in the afternoon. The Club has speakers, goes on outings and sometimes has an annual week's holiday together. There is a monthly lunch club with the meal cooked by Mrs.Ryan in the school kitchen. There is a Ladies Keep Fit class in school.
